remarks.format: ## Remarks 类提供一个通用的基类，适配器可以从哪些控件继承。The class provides a general base class from which control adapters can inherit. 此类提供的默认实现所需的所有适配器的接口。This class provides a default implementation of the interface required for all adapters. 基类的默认呈现实现应呈现所有子控件。The default rendering implementation of the base class should be to render all child controls. 这使基类用作组合控件适配器。This allows the base class to be used as an adapter for composition controls.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性是实现的属性接口，该获取或设置适配器所附加到的控件接口。The property is an implementation of the property for the interface, which gets or sets the control to which the adapter is attached. 对于单个控件适配器的支持，你可以创建强类型的属性来隐藏属性。For individual control adapters, you can create a strongly typed property to hide the property.

Public Overridable Sub CreateTemplatedUI (doDataBind As Boolean)

param.name: doDataBind
param.span: 如果为 ，则实例化的模板必须绑定到可用数据（通常发生在第一个请求中）。

span.span: If , the instantiated templates bind to available data (which usually happens on the first request).

param.span: 如果为 ，则模板不会绑定到数据，而需要根据视图状态进行填充（通常在后续回发时发生）。

span.span: If , the templates do not bind to data, and instead rely on view state to fill them in (which usually happens on subsequent postbacks).

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在接收一个回发事件通知，以检查事件是否是特定于适配器的时，将由控件调用此方法。This method is called by a control when it receives a postback event notification, to check whether the event is adapter-specific. 如果该控件实现方法，并接收回发事件，调用控件适配器的方法。If the control implements the method and receives a postback event, the method of the control adapter is called. 如果向控件发送的事件可以根据目标设备而有所不同，必须调用此方法的控件实现控件适配器的方法。If events sent to the control can vary depending on the target device, the control implementation of this method must call the method of the control adapter. 此方法返回`true`或`false`，以指示设备适配器是否处理该事件。This method returns `true` or `false`, indicating whether the device adapter handled the event. 它将返回`false`默认情况下。It returns `false` by default.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 从控件的父文件夹继承方法。The method is inherited from the control's parent. 如果控件处于移动服务器控件，此方法从继承类; 如果该控件是，此方法从继承类。If the control is a mobile server control, this method is inherited from the class; if the control is a , this method is inherited from the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 适配器可保存的控件的特定于适配器的状态。An adapter can save adapter-specific state for a control. 如果没有这样的功能是必需的则适配器返回`null`。If no such functionality is required, the adapter returns `null`.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此属性用于窗体分页。This property is used for form pagination. 值-1 指示必须使用元素的默认权重。A value of -1 indicates that the default weight for the element must be used. 有关详细信息，请参阅[分页](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/b4f4c4bc-226b-46ec-ae46-00497a32f4f2)。For further information, see [Pagination](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/b4f4c4bc-226b-46ec-ae46-00497a32f4f2).
